org.ardenus.graphics.buffer

Class VertexArrayObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ardenus.graphics.buffer.VertexArrayObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Deletable

    public class VertexArrayObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements Deletable
    Represents a vertex array object in OpenGL.
    Author:
    Trent "Whirvis" Summerlin

        private static void rebind()

      • setAttributePointer

        public void setAttributePointer(VertexAttribShaderConstant attribute,
                                int size,
                                int type,
                                boolean normalized,
                                int stride,
                                VertexBufferObject vbo)
        Points the specified vertex buffer object to the vertex array object.
        Parameters:
        attribute - the attribute that will be pointed to the vertex buffer object.
        size - the element count.
        type - the element type.
        normalized - true if normalized, false otherwise.
        stride - the stride.
        vbo - the vertex buffer object to the specified attribute.
